author: tanya
title: 6 best calamine lotions to get rid of skin irritation
text:
Our skin is constantly exposed to dust, dirt, and sunburn – all of which can cause several skin problems. On top of that, the constant use of cosmetic products can also lead to skin irritation, itching, pain, and discomfort. Therefore, it is important to maintain the health of our skin. Though there are several home remedies, like turmeric and aloe vera that help soothe these skin problems, there are several products available in the market that can help you get rid of skin discomfort. And one of them is calamine lotion, which has cooling and soothing properties. Before we delve into the best calamine lotion to get rid of skin irritation, it is important to understand its benefits.
Whether you are suffering from skin itching or irritation, calamine lotion is the one stop solution to get rid of all that. Here are some of the best calamine lotions in India that you can add to your skincare routine:
This calamine lotion from GLIMLACH Calamine is one of the best calamine lotions for itching. It provides protection to your skin from itching and rashes that occur due to allergic reactions, insect bites, heat and chicken pox. Zinc oxide, ferric oxide, aloe vera and castor oil are some of the ingredients used in this lotion that helps soothe down your skin. The brand claims that the product is 100 percent gluten free and dermatologically recommended, which makes it safer for you to use.
B09MYZWVS1
CUTISWISS Calamine Lotion is the perfect choice for you if you want to get rid of rashes, sunburns, itchiness and skin irritation. It is enriched with ingredients like calamine, light liquid paraffin, aloe vera, glycerin, phenoxyethanol, fragrance, EDTA, emulsifying wax, and preservatives. Additionally, calamine and aloe vera works effectively on acne scars, sunburns and deeply nourishes your skin, making it shinier and healthier. The brand claims that it is 100 percent paraben free, which makes it one of the best calamine lotions in the market.
B0BJD8G7S2
This Elegant Calarise Calamine Lotion is one of the best lotions in India as it is suitable for all skin types. It protects your skin from sun rashes and sun burns. Enriched with ingredients like aloe vera and zinc oxide, this lotion takes gentle care of your skin and protects it from itching and irritation.
B0BVVPKMKC
The Lacto Calamine Face Lotion plus Sunscreen benefits your skin wonderfully as it controls excess oil produced by your skin. Additionally, it provides
protection from UV rays. It is one of the best calamine lotions in India because it also acts as a flawless primer, which makes your makeup look smooth. It has a lightweight formula that makes it suitable for you to use on an everyday basis.
B0CDLQ86D9
If you are looking for calamine lotions for itching, this one from Segment Care is the perfect choice for you. It effectively works to alleviate minor skin irritations, insect bites and rashes. Additionally, the lotion provides relief from sunburns by cooling and soothing the affected area. Enriched with the goodness of ingredients like aloe vera, and zinc oxide, the lotion helps reduce inflammation, unclog pores,
absorb excess oil and moisturise your skin. The brand claims that the product is 100 percent sulphate, and paraben free, which makes it safe for you to incorporate into your skin care routine.
B0CH3BY599
Getting irritated or itchy skin is a common phenomenon today as we constantly get exposed to several allergic substances. However, you can get rid of these problems by using some of the best calamine lotions like Caladew Calamine Lotion. Formulated using ingredients like aloe vera and cucumber extract, the lotion provides relief from redness and inflammation.
B08B3R3VTZ
Your skin needs an equal amount of care as other parts of your body. Therefore, you must incorporate some of the best calamine lotion in your skincare routine to relieve skin irritation. Here are the benefits of calamine lotion for skin irritation:
The constant exposure to cosmetics, dirt, dust and hormonal imbalance can lead to acne. Incorporating calamine lotion in your skin care routine for acne prone skin is the best solution. It helps treat acne and it also prevents acne scars and spots. The skin-drying property of this lotion makes it the best for preventing acne irritation.
You can also use calamine lotion for dry skin because it reduces dryness. Additionally, it keeps your skin hydrated and moisturised.
Skin pigmentation is a common problem that affects many people. Calamine lotions have properties that can reduce pigmentation and
even out your skin tone.
If you are prone to getting sunburns, this lotion might be able to help you. It is important to treat your skin with care to get rid of sunburns. And it contains cooling and soothing properties that can help you.
Calamine lotion can even help prevent itchiness and skin irritation caused by chicken pox or insect bites.
B08B3R3VTZ

All products listed are carefully curated by the editorial team but use your discretion and an expert’s opinion before using them. Their price and availability may differ from the time of publication. If you buy something using these links in the story, we may earn a commission.)

author: financialcontent.com
title: Oxbridge Notes Invites New Authors to Join Its Expanding Marketplace as Part of Its 15th Anniversary Celebration | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Oxbridge Notes Invites New Authors to Join Its Expanding Marketplace as Part of Its 15th Anniversary Celebration Oxbridge Notes Marks 15 Years, Expands Platform to Welcome New Student Authors Across Diverse Academic Disciplines. Marking its 15th year in the educational resource sector, Oxbridge Notes has announced the broadening of its platform to include contributions from student authors in a range of academic disciplines. This expansion, coinciding with the company's anniversary, reflects a strategic move to embrace a wider academic community.
Transition from Legal Focus to Diverse Academic Fields
Initially focused on legal education resources, Oxbridge Notes has evolved to encompass study materials across multiple majors. This transition signifies the company's commitment to offering concise, detailed study notes and resources in various academic areas. In tandem with this expansion, Oxbridge Notes continues to support legal education, evidenced by a collection of over 8,000 free samples, including more than 1,600 legal case studies.
Opportunities for Student Authors in Various Disciplines
The expanded platform presents an opportunity for student authors from any academic background to contribute study notes. This initiative aims to facilitate the sharing of knowledge and resources among students and academics globally, thereby enriching the academic experience in numerous fields.
Rebranding to Reflect a More Inclusive Academic Approach
The 15th anniversary of Oxbridge Notes is marked by a refreshed brand identity, indicative of the company's growth and its renewed focus on providing accessible, high-quality educational resources. The rebranding positions Oxbridge Notes as not only a resource for legal studies but also a comprehensive platform for academic excellence across a variety of subjects.
The Role of Oxbridge Notes in Academic Collaboration and Resource Exchange
Oxbridge Notes operates as a platform and marketplace where students, particularly those who excel in their studies, can upload and sell their study notes. The platform facilitates an environment where academic collaboration is encouraged. It allows student authors to share their expertise and insights, thereby contributing to a broader knowledge base accessible to a global student audience. This system of exchanging and selling notes is designed to benefit both the contributors for their scholarly efforts and the recipients in their academic pursuits.
For more information on Oxbridge Notes, selling notes, and joining our community, please contact:
Oxbridge Notes
info@oxbridgenotes.co.uk
https://oxbridgenotes.com/
https://oxbridgenotes.co.uk/
 Oxbridge Notes
Contact Person: Bradford Toney
Email: Send Email
Country: United Kingdom
Website: https://oxbridgenotes.com/sell_notes

author: sina.com.cn
title: 最高看涨至12.70港元！大摩、中金齐看好先声药业(02096) 创新药增长潜力可期|先声药业_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
2025年4月2日，摩根士丹利发表研报将 先声药业 （02096）目标价从8.70港元上调至9.50港元，并同步调高乐观情景下目标价至12.70港元（原11.80港元），给予“增持”评级。
据悉，先声药业近日公布2024年业绩，符合市场预期，收入66.35亿元，同比增长0.4%；归母净利润7.33亿元，同比增长2.6%，经调整归母净利润10.18亿元，同比增长41.6%。
对此，中金发布研报称，基本维持2025年和2026年盈利预测不变，维持先声药业(02096)跑赢行业评级和8.80港元目标价，对应17.4倍2025年市盈率和15.6倍2026年市盈率。公司多款创新早研产品(来自公司ADC/TCE/小分子平台)积极推进临床，中金认为具备license out潜力，期待今年取得积极进展。
交银国际 发布研报称，上调先声药业2025-26年经调整净利润预测6-8%，主要反映更乐观的利润率改善空间。2H24公司业绩增速如期迎来复苏，预计这一趋势将延续至2025-27年，公司将迎来6款创新药上市，同时创新技术平台有望持续产出BD出海机会，上调目标价至11.2港元，看好业绩复苏和BD催化估值修复，继续将公司选为行业重点推荐标的之一。

author: Zacks Investment Research
title: Are You Looking for a Top Momentum Pick? Why Snap (SNAP) is a Great Choice - December 29, 2023 - Zacks.com
text:
Momentum investing is all about the idea of following a stock's recent trend, which can be in either direction. In the 'long' context, investors will essentially be "buying high, but hoping to sell even higher." And for investors following this methodology, taking advantage of trends in a stock's price is key; once a stock establishes a course, it is more than likely to continue moving in that direction. The goal is that once a stock heads down a fixed path, it will lead to timely and profitable trades.
While many investors like to look for momentum in stocks, this can be very tough to define. There is a lot of debate surrounding which metrics are the best to focus on and which are poor quality indicators of future performance. The Zacks Momentum Style Score, part of the Zacks Style Scores , helps address this issue for us.
Below, we take a look at Snap ( SNAP Quick Quote SNAP - Free Report ) , a company that currently holds a Momentum Style Score of A. We also talk about price change and earnings estimate revisions, two of the main aspects of the Momentum Style Score.
It's also important to note that Style Scores work as a complement to the Zacks Rank, our stock rating system that has an impressive track record of outperformance. Snap currently has a Zacks Rank of #2 (Buy). Our research shows that stocks rated Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy) and #2 (Buy) and Style Scores of A or B outperform the market over the following one-month period.
You can see the current list of Zacks #1 Rank Stocks here >>>
Set to Beat the Market?
Let's discuss some of the components of the Momentum Style Score for SNAP that show why this company behind Snapchat shows promise as a solid momentum pick.
Looking at a stock's short-term price activity is a great way to gauge if it has momentum, since this can reflect both the current interest in a stock and if buyers or sellers have the upper hand at the moment. It's also helpful to compare a security to its industry; this can show investors the best companies in a particular area.
For SNAP, shares are up 0.77% over the past week while the Zacks Internet - Software industry is up 0.83% over the same time period. Shares are looking quite well from a longer time frame too, as the monthly price change of 23.28% compares favorably with the industry's 6.74% performance as well.
While any stock can see a spike in price, it takes a real winner to consistently outperform the market. Over the past quarter, shares of Snap have risen 95.08%, and are up 93.53% in the last year. On the other hand, the S&P 500 has only moved 11.75% and 28.39%, respectively.
Investors should also pay attention to SNAP's average 20-day trading volume. Volume is a useful item in many ways, and the 20-day average establishes a good price-to-volume baseline; a rising stock with above average volume is generally a bullish sign, whereas a declining stock on above average volume is typically bearish. SNAP is currently averaging 25,882,772 shares for the last 20 days.
Earnings Outlook
The Zacks Momentum Style Score also takes into account trends in estimate revisions, in addition to price changes. Please note that estimate revision trends remain at the core of Zacks Rank as well. A nice path here can help show promise, and we have recently been seeing that with SNAP.
Over the past two months, 2 earnings estimates moved higher compared to none lower for the full year. These revisions helped boost SNAP's consensus estimate, increasing from $0.04 to $0.06 in the past 60 days. Looking at the next fiscal year, 2 estimates have moved upwards while there have been no downward revisions in the same time period.
Bottom Line
Given these factors, it shouldn't be surprising that SNAP is a #2 (Buy) stock and boasts a Momentum Score of A. If you're looking for a fresh pick that's set to soar in the near-term, make sure to keep Snap on your short list.

author: M Dowling
title: This Is the Truth About How Many Catholics View Jesuits
text:
Pope Francis is a left-wing Jesuit and doesn’t represent Catholicism as I’ve known it. He is an outlier, as are most Jesuits. Some are perfectly fine people, and some are definitely not. The order is generally outside the mainstream of Catholicism.
The same goes for Catholic Charities and its offshoots.
I had one priest tell me if Jose Bergoglio, Pope Francis, is chosen by The College of Cardinals, he would be the worst choice, and he is. Pope Francis is in the hospital right now, and we wish him well, but it would be nice if he retired.
I remember talking to one Jesuit about a term paper I wrote, and he told me abortion was fine as long as you feel good about it. He told me people aren’t really sinners since they generally don’t mean it, and so on. Bigeye roll here.
If you want to commit a sin, you go to the Jesuits to get permission.
Read the crazed email Libs of TikTok received:
Our traditional Catholic K-12 makes this hole look like Karl Marx Central School. I thank God daily we never have to deal with these weirdos.
Jesuits are far outliers on the leftist margin of Catholicism. Their laity teachers are even worse. My family ignores them all entirely. https://t.co/uddZJ99BTF
— Michael R. Caputo (@MichaelRCaputo) February 15, 2025

author: @infobae
title: Adalberto Carrasquilla es el nuevo jugador de Pumas para el Clausura 2025 - Infobae
text:
Pumas hace oficial el fichaje de Adalberto Carrasquilla (USA TODAY/Kirby Lee//REUTERS) Es oficial, Adalberto Carrasquilla es el nuevo jugador del club Universidad Nacional para el Clausura 2025 . La tarde de este 16 de enero, Pumas confirmó la incorporación de Coco Carrasquilla a la plantilla de Gustavo Lema . Era cuestión de días para que presentaran el fichaje del panameño.
En días recientes se filtró la negociación que mantuvo el equipo de la UNAM con Coco Carrasquilla para llevárselo a la Liga MX, tras acordar su traspaso, el jugador proveniente del Houston Dynamo portará la camiseta auriazul.
Por medio de redes sociales le dieron la bienvenida a su nuevo refuerzo, quien es el segundo en incorporarse para este Clausura 2025.
Foto de archivo de Adalberto Carrasquilla (8) durante un partido amistoso entre las selecciones de Panamá y Estados Unidos. Estadio Q2, Austin, Texas, EEUU. 12 de octubre de 2024. CREDITO OBLIGADO USA TODAY/Scott Wachter “ Adalberto Coco Carrasquilla Alcázar es nuevo jugador de Pumas . El mediocampista panameño se suma así a los universitarios como segundo refuerzo para el Clausura 2025, después de haberse integrado al conjunto el guardameta Alex Padilla”, informaron en un comunicado.
Según con lo que explicó la directiva universitaria, el mejor jugador de la Concacaf 2023- 2024 estará vinculado por “un largo tiempo”, pero no especificaron detalles de su contrato.
“Carrasquilla estará ligado al Club Universidad Nacional con un contrato de larga duración y se integrará de forma inmediata a los entrenamientos del conjunto auriazul, para ponerse a disposición del entrenador Gustavo Lema y sumar sus primeros minutos como jugador de Pumas en este Clausura 2025″, agregaron.
El goleador de 26 años inició su carrera profesional con el Tauro de Panamá, compitió de 2015 a 2019 ahí, más tarde partió a Europa para competir con el FC Cartagena. Para 2021 partió a la MLS y jugó con Houston Dynamo.
Coco Carrasquilla es el nuevo jugador de Pumas (X/ @PumasMX) Coco Carrasquillo aceptó que viene con un rendimiento bajo tras su paso por la MLS Cuando el panameño arribó a la Ciudad de México compartió sus primeras declaraciones, en un encuentro con la prensa en su paso por el Aeropuerto Internacional de la Ciudad de México aceptó que viene con un rendimiento bajo.
Consideró que la inactividad desde noviembre lo tiene rezagado a nivel de competencia, pero confía ponerse al corriente con el club para debutar lo más pronto posible.
“Terminamos en noviembre la última fecha, pero yo todo diciembre me preparé bastante duro por mi propia cuenta. De pronto, vengo un poco con el nivel bajo de competencia, pero estoy seguro de que no estoy del todo mal”, compartió.
Coco Carrasquilla confesó que viene bajo de rendimiento, pero se preparará para debutar con Pumas (Steven Bisig-Imagn Images/ Reuters) Con el Houston Dynamo conquistó la U.S Open Cup 2023, encuentro en el que vencieron 2 - 1 al Inter de Miami. Anteriormente fue campeón en 2017 y 2018 con el Tauro , así como el del ascenso a la Segunda División de España en 2020, con FC Cartagena.
A nivel de selecciones, fue convocado a la Copa Mundial Sub-20 de 2015 en Nueva Zelanda, así como a los Juegos Centroamericanos de 2017 y los Panamericanos de 2019. Con la selección mayor canalera, debutó en 2018 y desde entonces ha tenido participación constante en los torneos de la Concacaf Nations League y la Copa Oro de la Concacaf (fue elegido el mejor jugador del torneo de 2023 , en el que Panamá consiguió el subcampeonato), además de haber disputado la Copa América de 2024.

author: Les jeunes du club de prévention Recherche Action Sociales (RAS) de Liévin
title: À la ferme pédagogique du Moulin de bois à Farbus, on trouve même… des alpagas ! - La Voix du Nord
text: À la ferme pédagogique du Moulin de bois à Farbus, on trouve même… des alpagas ! Pouvez-vous nous présenter les alpagas ? « Alors, je vous présente Paquito et Phébus. Ils ont le même âge : 2 ans. Ils viennent tous les deux de l’élevage de la cour Farroux, dans l’Aisne. Nous sommes allés les chercher quand ils avaient à peu près 8, 9 mois, quand ils étaient sevrés. Mais dans leur milieu naturel, ce sont des animaux qui vivent au Pérou, en Amérique du Sud. » De quoi se nourrissent-ils ? « Ce sont des animaux végétariens. Ils se nourrissent essentiellement d’herbe, de feuillage, de foin… Il ne leur faut pas grand-chose d’autre. L’alpaga est un ruminant. Il a des dents en bas, mais pas en haut. Un peu comme les chèvres. » Est-ce qu’ils aiment vivre seuls ? « Alors, non. Ce sont des animaux grégaires. Cela veut dire qu’ils aiment vivre en groupe. Donc quand on prend un alpaga, on sait qu’on ne va pas en prendre un, mais forcément deux. Sinon, il va s’ennuyer et il ne sera pas en bonne santé. » Sont-ils fragiles ? « Pas vraiment. Puisque ce sont des animaux qui vivent au Pérou, en altitude. Donc ils sont assez résistants. Le problème, c’est que ce sont des ruminants. Et un blocage de la rumination, ça peut être fatal. Et puis, le souci qu’on rencontre aussi, c’est que les vétérinaires ne sont pas forcément formés à la santé des alpagas. Chez l’alpaga, l’espérance de vie est d’environ une vingtaine d’années. » Quel est le rôle des alpagas à la ferme ? « Nous avons choisi de prendre des alpagas pour la médiation animale, parce que ce sont des animaux relativement doux. Évidemment, ils ont été aussi bien éduqués dans l’élevage, avant d’arriver ici. Ils ont été socialisés et habitués à l’humain. Mais il faut savoir quand même que ce sont des animaux très craintifs. Quand on les approche, il faut toujours beaucoup de précautions. » [Violences chez les jeunes : sanctions sur le diplôme, plus d’heures au collège, internat, ce qu’a annoncé Gabriel Attal](/1453345/article/2024-04-18/violences-chez-les-jeunes-sanctions-sur-le-diplome-plus-d-heures-au-college) [Au collège Jean-Jacques-Rousseau d’Avion, le théâtre utilisé pour réguler les émotions des élèves](/1453375/article/2024-04-18/au-college-jean-jacques-rousseau-d-avion-le-theatre-utilise-pour-reguler-les) [Le 24 avril, des aménagements pour plus de sécurité devant le lycée public d’Avesnes](/1452908/article/2024-04-17/le-24-avril-des-amenagements-pour-plus-de-securite-devant-le-lycee-public-d) Poursuivez votre lecture sur ce(s) sujet(s) : [Ta Voix Jeunes reporters](/tags/ta-voix-jeunes-reporters) [Ta Voix Loisirs](/tags/ta-voix-loisirs)

author: PTI
title: Pakistan Iran agree to 'de-escalate the situation' and strengthen coordination on counter-terrorism - The Week
text:
Islamabad, Jan 19 (PTI) Pakistan and Iran on Friday agreed to "de-escalate the situation" and strengthen coordination on counter-terrorism as the two sides began to pick threads of tattered ties following their tit-for-tat military strikes in each other's territory.
Foreign Minister Jalil Abbas Jilani spoke with his Iranian counterpart Hossein Amir-Abdollahian on the telephone and expressed his country's desire to “work with Iran based on the spirit of mutual trust and cooperation,” Pakistan’s Foreign Office said in a statement.
"The Foreign Minister stressed that respect for territorial integrity and sovereignty must underpin this cooperation," it said.
They "agreed that working-level cooperation and close coordination on counter-terrorism and other aspects of mutual concern should be strengthened. They also agreed to de-escalate the situation,” the FO said, underscoring the close "brotherly relations" between the two neighbours.
The return of the Ambassadors of the two countries to their respective capitals was also discussed.
In a separate statement earlier, the FO said Foreign Minister Jilani expressed Pakistan’s readiness to work with Iran on "all issues and underscored the need for closer cooperation on security issues".
The positive development came after Pakistan conducted "precision military strikes" against what it called "terrorist hideouts" in Iran's Siestan-Balochistan province that killed 9 people on Thursday. The attack was seen as retaliation to Iranian missile and drone attacks on Tuesday, which targeted two bases of the Sunni Baloch militant group Jaish al-Adl in Pakistan's unruly Balochistan province.
According to IRNA, Iran’s official news agency, Amir Abdollahian urged Pakistan to assist in “foiling plots and destroying terrorist hideouts in its territories.”
The top Iranian diplomat also called for the pursuit of security and military cooperation seriously, noting that Iranian forces will not allow terrorist groups to carry out sabotage in the country.
Pointing to Iran’s recent attack on a hideout of the so-called Jaish al-Adl terrorist group inside Pakistani soil, he argued that intelligence documents showed that over 50 terrorists were getting ready to conduct terrorist attacks on Iran.
He further said that under the current circumstances in Palestine, where the Israeli regime is committing crimes against the oppressed nation, influential countries of the Islamic world such as Iran and Pakistan are expected to maintain unity.
Pakistani foreign minister, for his part, emphasized that both nations have a common attitude in the fight against terrorism, adding that Islamabad underlines the need for maintaining constructive and brotherly ties with Tehran.
In the phone conversation, the Pakistani top diplomat officially invited his Iranian counterpart to visit Islamabad, the IRNA said.
Earlier, Jilani and his Turkish counterpart Hakan Fidan discussed the “ongoing developments between Pakistan and Iran”, the Foreign Office said.
He told Fidan that the military strikes were aimed at terrorist camps inside Iran and added that Pakistan has no interest or desire for escalation.
Also, officials of the foreign ministries from Iran and Pakistan exchanged goodwill messages, belying fears of escalation and showing that the tiff between the two neighbours was cooling off sooner than it erupted two days ago.
Foreign Office Spokesperson Mumtaz Zahra Baloch shared an exchange of messages between Additional Foreign Secretary Rahim Hayat Qureshi and his Iranian counterpart Seyed Rasoul Mousavi on her X handle, saying: “Some positive exchanges.”
In a post on X today, the Foreign Office additional secretary responded to his Iranian counterpart’s letter saying he reciprocated the sentiments of “dear brother Seyed Rasoul Mousavi.”
He said Pakistan and Iran have fraternal relations and the countries need to move forward to resolve all issues through positive dialogue.
He said that it is important to restore trust and confidence that has always defined bilateral relations between the two countries. “Our common challenges including terrorism require coordinated action,” he added.
Mousavi said he believed that Iran’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs is the endpoint of the prevailing tensions between the two countries. “Leaders and high officials of both countries know that only terrorists and enemies of both countries benefit from the existing tension between the two neighbouring countries,” he wrote on X in Persian.
